<title level="1" right="Rules">[Set Relics](/Rules.aspx?ID=1970)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 200 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Some permanent magic items are strongly attuned to one another, forming a [relic seed](/Rules.aspx?ID=1096) called a set relic or item set. Such items fit a theme, empowering a specific type of character. A set relic grants gifts and benefits based on its items working and growing more powerful in concert.
</column>
